entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 2:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
